Shop

Road Bikes

Some of the hardest decisions we had to take was selecting the brands we wanted to offer. After agonising over many weeks and many coffee's we made our final choices. We had to tick many boxes to ensure we have something for everyone, from the first timer to the seasoned athlete, from entry level to sky's the limit. We are extremely proud to bring what we feel is a well curated selection that hopefully offers something for everyone.

Stunning works of art from 'Cinelli' of Italy that simply radiate elegance and style with their road, cyclocross and gravel models, not to mention their stunning single speed and fixed gear models. In the words of Antonio Colombo (Cinelli president) "I want to make beautiful and unique bicycles, joining tradition and modernity, technology and creativity, art and design, Italy and the world" We take the time to expertly fit every customer to ensure your comfort and performance is maximized.

Parts & Accessories

The world of parts is vast, from the outset we have chosen products that offer excellent quality and strong value for money. Everything we sell has been tested to ensure your satisfaction is guaranteed. From the humble ball bearing to a beautifully engineered and crafted component we have taken our time to pick brands that share our work ethic and commitment. As we grow so will our range, we very much look forward to bringing you new things from the worlds best.
